body:
To add a page, click 'Add page' in the top blue navigation bar

In the next screen, choose where you want to add the page within your service.

You can add a page as:

- a [step](/steps) of the start page (that is, to the main service flow) - you can change its position in the flow later
- a step of the another page that has steps enabled - you can change its position in this flow later

You can also add a page as standalone page. This means it's not part of any page flow
heading: Adding a page
